title: The Unlikely Adventures of Pit Simmons: Consultant Hero
summary: Pit Simmons, a 22-year-old consulting enthusiast, discovers his ability to foresee business disasters and uses his powers to save companies throughout an action-packed week.
summaryGerman: Pit Simmons, ein 22-jähriger Beratungsenthusiast, entdeckt seine Fähigkeit, Geschäftskatastrophen vorherzusehen und nutzt seine Kräfte, um Unternehmen in einer aktionsreichen Woche zu retten.
summaryDutch: Pit Simmons, een 22-jarige adviesliefhebber, ontdekt zijn vermogen om zakelijke rampen te voorspellen en gebruikt zijn krachten om bedrijven te redden gedurende een actievolle week.
summaryFrench: Pit Simmons, un passionné de conseil de 22 ans, découvre sa capacité à prévoir des désastres commerciaux et utilise ses pouvoirs pour sauver des entreprises tout au long d'une semaine riche en actions.

story.text: Pit discovers his superpower while consulting for a struggling toy company, predicting their downfall and devising a strategy that saves them.
Empowered by his success, Pit helps a tech startup revise their failing project, predicting major flaws before they become critical.
Pit faces a moral dilemma as he uncovers unethical practices at a client's company. He decides to take the high road, leading to a peaceful resolution.
A romantic twist unfolds when Pit meets another consultant who shares his passion and ethics. They join forces in a strategic partnership.
Pit's abilities reach the ears of a powerful conglomerate, who invite him to a secretive meeting. An eerie feeling accompanies him as he enters the boardroom.
The meeting reveals a sinister plot to monopolize the consulting industry. Pit uses his strategic foresight to disrupt the scheme, saving his and other small consultancies.
Reflecting on his hectic week, Pit decides to form a consultancy that focuses not just on profit, but on ethics and foresight, leading a new wave of business consulting.

ending: Thus, Pit Simmons not only became a hero in the corporate world, but a beacon of integrity and foresight in business.
moral: True heroism lies not just in strength, but in foresight and ethical conduct.
